page.title: 16CHARLTON-HANK.FARMING 2
page.content:
{Pigs There is one intensive pig farm of 120 Cotswold Hybrid breeding sows; piglets housed and fattened for pork.Pigs are sold out for 115p per kilo,average weight 45 kilos.
{Grain Three farms of approximately 400 acres are arable growing barley,wheat and rape in rotation.Most of the grain is sold for cattle feed; a small amount for malting and milling.It is cut by a 200 h.p. combine harvester with a 15' cut. Average price per tonne for wheat is Â£115, for Barley Â£100 and for rape Â£250.Rape is used in animal feed and domestic cooking oil.Most of the straw is baled for bedding,some barley straw is used for food.Stubble and unwanted straw is either burned or chopped and ploughed in.
